seo.title: LangShift.dev - Programming Language Learning Platform | Master New Languages from What You Know
seo.description: LangShift.dev is a programming language learning platform designed for developers. Learn new languages through syntax comparison and concept mapping. Support JavaScript to Python, Rust and more with interactive code editors and progressive learning paths.

hero.title: Master New Languages, Faster.
hero.subtitle: Learn by Comparison, Not from Scratch.
hero.description: LangShift.dev helps you leverage your existing programming knowledge to learn new syntaxes and paradigms intuitively. Stop starting from scratch, start shifting your skills.

codeComparison.title: Code Comparison Learning
codeComparison.description: Side-by-side syntax comparison for intuitive language understanding

progressiveLearning.title: Progressive Mastery
progressiveLearning.description: From basics to advanced, 13 modules systematic learning

realProjects.title: Real Projects
realProjects.description: 30+ real projects covering multiple application domains

howItWorks.title: How LangShift.dev Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Your path to mastering new languages, simplified.

steps.title: Choose Your Base Language
steps.description: Select the programming language you already know well. This is your foundation.

steps.title: Pick Your Target Language
steps.description: Choose the new language you want to learn. We'll bridge the gap for you.

steps.title: Learn Side-by-Side
steps.description: Experience interactive lessons with real-time code comparisons, making learning intuitive and efficient.

codeDemo.title: See the Comparison in Action
codeDemo.subtitle: Understand new syntax instantly with our side-by-side code editor.
codeDemo.experienceDescription: Choose your familiar language and target language, view syntax comparison and concept mapping in real-time

coursesSection.title: Choose Your Learning Path
coursesSection.subtitle: Start from the language you know, and quickly grasp the essence of a new one.

js2py.title: JavaScript ‚Üí Python
js2py.description: Learn Python from a JavaScript developer perspective. Master syntax conversion and concept mapping. Includes web development, data processing, and automation projects.

js2rust.title: JavaScript ‚Üí Rust
js2rust.description: Learn Rust from a JavaScript developer perspective. Understand memory safety and systems programming. Master ownership system and zero-cost abstractions.

features.title: Why Choose LangShift.dev?
features.subtitle: Modern learning experience designed for developers

codeEditor.title: Interactive Code Editor
codeEditor.description: Run code in real-time and see results instantly. Support multi-language syntax highlighting and intelligent suggestions for intuitive learning.

syntaxComparison.title: Smart Syntax Comparison
syntaxComparison.description: Side-by-side syntax comparison between languages with automatic concept mapping for quick understanding of language features.

learningPath.title: Progressive Learning Path
learningPath.description: Complete learning system from basics to advanced with 13 progressive modules ensuring effective learning outcomes.

performance.title: Performance Monitoring
performance.description: Real-time code execution performance monitoring, comparing performance characteristics across languages to optimize development efficiency.

projects.title: Real-world Projects
projects.description: 30+ real project cases covering web development, data processing, systems programming and more domains.

community.title: Developer Community
community.description: Connect with developers worldwide, share learning experiences, solve technical challenges, and grow together.

learningPath.title: Complete Learning Path
learningPath.subtitle: From basic syntax to advanced features, 13 modules progressive learning

items.name: Zhang Ming
items.content: Learned Python through LangShift.dev and could develop web applications independently in 2 weeks. The comparison learning approach is really effective, much faster than traditional learning!

items.name: Li Hua
items.content: The JavaScript to Rust conversion learning gave me a whole new understanding of systems programming with significant performance improvements and higher code quality.

items.name: Wang Qiang
items.content: Our team uses LangShift.dev for tech stack migration training. Learning efficiency improved 3x, highly recommended for all developers learning new languages!

cta.title: Ready to start your language learning journey?
cta.subtitle: Join 5,000+ developers in learning
